186024847.review: bela experiência pra alguém que não vê o sol por meses(não é o meu caso)

185992604.review: I call this one of my "no brain games", meaning I play this while listening to literally anything else, which is oddly therapeutic for me. Despite the blood and gore, I find the game calming and satisfying to spend and hour or two playing and the feeling of completing a map is the best thing ever. The spilling of buckets and crates may be annoying to deal with, but because I'm already calm while playing the game, they thankfully don't bother me as much. Recommended for anyone who may greatly enjoy cleaning games and some rag-doll physics. As long as blood and dead things don't bother you, I think you'd have fun with it. Plus some little bits of lore only adds to the fun in my opinion.

185674128.review:
[h1] Un juego de limpieza al estilo gore [/h1]
Eres un empleado de limpieza mal pagado, que trabaja para una empresa que le vale madres lo que te ocurra en los lugares de limpieza donde anteriormente hubo una invasión alienígena, una rebelión de los empleados que solo pedían mejores sueldos, experimentos fallidos, etc. Bueno si por alguna razón te moriste en alguno de estos mapas, felicidades eres simplemente reemplazado, el lado bueno es que si limpias casi a la perfección recibes un aumento, o sorpresa re llegaran mensajes amenazantes del típico empleado envidioso que prefiere que mueres a que sigas recibiendo los aumentos, como la vida real.
Buenp hablano de gameplay es un juego de limpieza que mas puedes pedir, lo que lo hace único es la temática  sangrienta con la que se maneja el juego, en total tienes 15 mapas, mas los 4 dlc que te ofrecen una buena hora de divercion, claro si te gustan los juegos que tienen físicas absurdas en cada pixel como: de bala, cubeta, vísceras,etc. En este juego no tienes algo para recoger todo en uno como el Cleaning criminal case, aquí todo lo recoges de uno en uno, digamos si hay 20 balas en un lugar, las recoges uno en uno para ponerlo en una cubeta, y así son con las demás basuras o partes de cuerpos, la mayoría de los mapas son disfrutables, pero hay otros que son un dolor de huevos como el mapa penumbra, hablando de lore el juego no tiene mucho lore, lo que te conté arriba es algo resumido del juego, pero cada nota que te encuentres te va a contar una parte de lo que sucedió en el mapa, claro si sabes ingles, porque lo malo de este juego es que no existe traducción, luego otra cosa única de este juego aparte de limpiar es tapar los huecos de balas, apilar los barriles y cajas a sus lugares específicos, alzar toda la basura y descubrir algunos easter eggs que contienen algunos mapas, eso es lo que te ofrece este juego, no lo recomendaría si buscas relajarte con este juego, pero si tienen algún amigo que tiene el juego, adelante cómpralo para que puedas reventarlo a dinamitazos mientras intenta limpiar el mapa, si eres alguien solitario puedes comprarlo seguro te relajas pero te menciono que las físicas te darán mas dolor de cabeza.

I wanted a game similar to crime scene cleaner. This just isn't it.

184619704.review:
재밌는 똥겜. 

1. 조작감과 물리엔진이 답답함. 
물통과 상자 쌓기나 물통 운반 등 간단한 작업도 물리 엔진의 한계때문에 번거러움. 물통은 자꾸 쓸때마다 픽픽쓰러지고 상자나 오브젝트들을 쌓아야하는 임무가 있는데 상자들은 특유의 물리엔진때문에 적재를 해놓아도 본인들끼리 부딛히며 이리저리 튐. 지게차는 멈추거나 에러라면서 플레이어와 오브젝트를 날려보냄 답답해 뒤질거같음. 

2. 불친절함및 가이드 부족 (+언어지원)
인지도에 비해 불편한 요소들이 많음. 명확한 튜토리얼이 없어서 커뮤니티나 공략글들을 찾아보고 무엇을 청소해야하는지 알아 내야하는데 맵 하나할때마다 부족한 커뮤니티, 정보, 공략들들을 찾아봐야함. 


솔로로 하는 겜이 아니라 일부 요소는 처음엔 재미있는데 결국 진지하게 임할 수록 불쾌한 요소임. 

무엇보다 1번 문제가 너무 큼.

184216232.review:
It's fun and really chilled but can be quite tedious with all the back and forth between getting water, bins and putting stuff in the incinerator would definitely recommend playing with friends as some of the longer levels can definitely take a while solo and they can help clean or spice up the game with some funny shenanigans. Workshop support with even more levels for you to enjoy. Some body parts glitch through the bins and leave blood stains and knocking bloody buckets over is annoying but game is really fast to load and has no issues.

You get your own office to store Easter eggs and a bunch of other collectables with tons of shelves and notes that pop up on failure or passing a level. Always get over 85% or you'll get fired save before leaving a level to be safe.

184055912.review:
Viscera Cleanup Detail is the game you didn’t know you needed (or wanted), but now can't stop playing—because who wouldn’t want to clean up the equivalent to a gamer's first time playing a video game that gave them a bit too much freedom? In this oddly satisfying simulator, you're not the one causing the mess (for once); you’re the unsung hero tidying up after it all. Armed with a mop, a bucket, and an array of cleaning tools, you're on a mission to restore order to environments filled with... uh... "interesting debris"?

The gameplay is simple: clean up the mess, avoid stepping in it (good luck), and hope you don’t spill something in the process. One wrong move and you'll find yourself making a bigger mess than before. It's strangely satisfying to turn what was once a chaotic mess into a spotless work environment, even if your cleaning methods are probably best described as "palaeolithic" at heart.

If you’ve ever wondered what it’s like to be the person who has to clean up after someone else's big meltdown when quitting McDonalds, Viscera Cleanup Detail lets you live that dream! It’s a kind of weird and quirky, yet oddly relaxing experience that leaves you wondering why you're playing this game, and why it keeps you coming back for more.

In short: it’s a fun, offbeat game that proves there’s more to cleanup than just a broom and internal screaming. Just make sure you don’t lose track of your mop!

184019890.review: I want to say that I knew this game from my childhood, back when YouTube showed everything possible in everyone’s feed. Basically, I think I used to watch all kinds of stuff, and I didn’t really understand this game when I was little—maybe just a bit, even though I wanted to play it. But now I can say that it’s a game I want to take seriously and finish as the best!

183604002.review: This game IS fun, I'll say it, but this game has a fundamental problem that feels funny and even fun at first but it legitimately becomes so infuriating and unfun after a while it made me genuinely want to uninstall the game multiple times in multiple levels (and will continue to do so more after this) that needs to be addressed badly: the physics, fucking suck. The game will actively punishes you for stacking things because of how terrible the physics are, and compound this with the jank and generally useless movement mechanics with the auto-step garbage that's inconsistent at best, you have a recipe for a genuinely terrible experience that makes the game go from a solid 8/10 HARD down to a 5/10 easily.
